long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you see it you can scrape it!

Extract Page is a powerful browser extension that allows you to effortlessly extract structured data from any web page. Whether you're a researcher, marketer, or data enthusiast, Extract Page simplifies the process of collecting information from across the web.

Key Features:
• Easy Setup: Define the fields you want to extract with a user-friendly interface
• Fast Extraction: Right-click on any web page to instantly extract data
• Flexible: Works on any website, allowing you to scrape a wide variety of information
• Portable Export: Copy extracted data directly to your spreadsheet application
• Free to Use: Utilize your own OpenAI API key for cost-effective scraping

How It Works:
1. Enter your OpenAI API key in the extension settings
2. Define the entity and fields you want to extract
3. Right-click on any web page and select "Extract data from this page"
4. Open the extension to copy your extracted results
5. Paste the data into your spreadsheet application

Extract Page is perfect for:
• Lead generation
• Market research
• Competitor analysis
• Academic research
• Price monitoring
• And much more!

With Extract Page, web scraping becomes accessible to everyone. No coding skills required – just point, click, and extract the data you need.

[ NOTE ] This extension requires an OpenAI API key to function. Users are responsible for any associated API costs, which are typically less than 1 cent per entity extracted.

Start scraping smarter, not harder. Add Extract Page to your browser today!
